Notice to Members: The ACLU of Missouri’s Board of Directors will consider changing the organization’s bylaws on June 15.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

We would like to inform our members that our board of directors will consider changes to the ACLU-MO bylaws on Saturday, June 15.

Visit our website to view the revised bylaws and read about the changes.

As always, thank you for fighting for the constitutional rights of all Missourians.

Tony Rothert
Legal Director and Interim Executive Director, ACLU of Missouri
